name: Joyce "Fenderella" Irby
description:
'''Joyce "Fenderella" Irby''' (born July 27, 1956, Orlando, FL - according to her 2022 memoir, "Id Still Say Yes") is an American singer, songwriter, [[bass guitarist]] and producer. She was the co-lead vocalist of the [[all-female band]] [[Klymaxx]].
Irby has also worked with artists such as [[Lloyd (singer)|Lloyd]], [[Troop (band)|Troop]], [[Sammie]], [[The SOS Band]] and [[Shalamar]].
